Brie wins at indie Spirit awards

Actor Brie Larson won the Best Actress award for Room at the 31st Independent Film Spirit Awards in Santa Monica, California, on Sunday. Emma Donoghue, the novelist-turned-screenwriter, also won for Best Adapted Screenplay for the film.

The foreign language favorite from Hungary, Laszlo Nemes’ Holocaust drama Son of Saul took best international film. And the documentary front-runner, the Indonesian genocide film Look of Silence won best documentary. Spotlight won the Best Picture award. — AP
title: 'Spotlight' tops a richly diverse Spirit Awards
